QuestData.Title: The Coffer of Promise
QuestData.Description: I'm not quite certain what ta expect 'ere, so stay on yer toes, eh?$b$bThese codes should reveal the coffer's true purpose, and present us with the tools to thwart Deathwing's efforts in Uldum fer good!$b$bStand back!
QuestData.LogDescription: Give Brann Bronzebeard the contents of the Coffer of Promise.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, now.$b$bWould ya look at that!?
QuestData.RewardText: Of course! I had a hunch this is what we'd find.$b$bHad no idea about the organic transformations, though, I must admit.$b$bThere's more to this old relic than I'd dared to hope.
